document_data.mainbody:
rym Fartreader was an adventurer that lived during the late 14 century DR. Gryms lasting legacy was a journal entry left within the depths of the Underdark, that remained nearly a century after their untimely death.
Gryms party ventured into a group of dungeons beneath Roth√© Valley in the . After encountering duergar that accused them of wielding dangerous magic, the group was beset by a cave-in on the fifth day of their expedition. While searching for a way past a set of locked doors, Grym became no more after being engulfed by a gelatinous cube.
